home.title: Welcome to SY
home.description: Stake your 1SY to borrow sUSD and contribute to the network collateral. If you’ve never staked before please read through this <0>quick introduction</0> first. Follow the steps below to get started.

utilities.title: Compatible Protocols
utilities.description: All protocols below are already live with Synthetix protocol, but are not yet integrated with sy.country. They are not affiliated with sy.country. Please check again at a later time for updates on integration and compatible new protocol launch with sy.country.
utilities.kwentaDescription: Trade commodities, forex, crypto, and more with up to 25x leverage and deep liquidity.
utilities.lyraDescription: Lyra’s decentralized exchange is the easiest place to buy and sell options on cryptocurrencies.
utilities.thalesDescription: Trade various parimutuel markets like price up or down, sports markets, and others.
utilities.dHedgeDescription: Use your sUSD to find the best investment managers and automated strategies in DeFi.
utilities.curveDescription: Deposit your synths into curve pools for yield on synth pairs and help provide liquidity to the ecosystem.
utilities.polynomialDescription: Crypto Perps with up to 50x leverage and deep liquidity.
utilities.overtimeDescription: Sports positional markets, built on Thales.
utilities.torosDescription: Toros enables a suite of one-click financial tools which simplify complex strategies.

main-action-cards.maintain-body: Use the burn feature to maintain your c-ratio or completely pay off debt and unstake your 1SY.
main-action-cards.collect-epoch-tooltip: Time to next epoch, you currently don't have any rewards

cratio-health-card.heading: Collateralization Ratio Health
cratio-health-card.sub-heading: In order to claim staking rewards, your C-Ratio must be at or above the target.

mint.description: Mint sUSD by staking your 1SY. 1SY stakers earn weekly staking rewards in exchange for managing their Collateralization Ratio and debt. <0>Your staked 1SY will be locked for 7 days.<0>
mint.description-existing: Borrowing more carries risks. Only do this if you are an experienced 1SY Staker and understand the risks.
mint.heading: How much 1SY do you want to stake?
mint.heading-tooltip: How much 1SY you stake will determine how much sUSD you can borrow
mint.borrowing-tooltip: How much 1SY you stake will determine how much sUSD you can borrow
mint.below-target-error: Minting not allowed when below target c-ratio

burn.title: Burn Debt
burn.description: Burn your sUSD debt to unlock your staked 1SY. This will increase your Collateralization Ratio and reduce your debt. <0>Learn more.<0>
burn.heading: Burn sUSD
burn.heading-tooltip: Burn sUSD to increase your c-ratio
burn.unstaking-tooltip: When your c-ratio is below target, all your 1SY is staked
burn.gas-tooltip: Is how much it costs to perform a transaction on the blockchain & GWEI is a denomination of Ether
burn.burn-max-tooltip: Burn all your debt or all the available sUSD
burn.burn-target-tooltip-not-allowed: You are already above target c-ratio
burn.unstaking-note: When burning while under target c-ratio, you are not unstaking 1SY. You need to burn {{sUsdAmountToTarget}} sUSD to have a c-ratio above target and unstake 1SY.

earn.title: Earn Rewards
earn.description: Earn Rewards Staking 1SY tokens offers weekly rewards in both inflationary 1SY and sUSD from trading fees. <0>Learn more<0>

modal.description: With the new <0>SIP-255</0>, trading fees don't need to be claimed anymore. They will now go directly to repaying a part of your debt and increasing your C-ratio.

self-liquidation.headline: Self Liquidate
self-liquidation.sub-headline: If you are unable to pay down your sUSD debt, you can self liquidate your 1SY collateral, with a {{penalty}} penalty. Self Liquidation is permanent, and results in the loss of some or all of your collateral. <linkTag>Read more about self liquidation</linkTag>
self-liquidation.amounts-headline: Self Liquidation calculation, in 1SY and USD value
self-liquidation.button-text: Yes I want to Self Liquidate

transaction-modal.metamask-note: Follow your wallet prompts to authorize the transaction.

c-ratio-banner.error: You're below the liquidation C-Ratio. Fix it now to avoid getting flagged for liquidation
c-ratio-banner.error-flagged: Your Account Has Been Flagged. Unflag your account within the time to avoid Liquidation

eth-gas-price-estimator.gas-price-tooltip: Value required to conduct a transaction

unflag-options.heading: Unflag Account
unflag-options.text: If you are unable to pay down your sUSD debt, you can self liquidate your 1SY collateral, with a {{penalty}} penalty. Self Liquidation is permanent, and results in the loss of some or all of your collateral.

unflag.heading: Unflag my account by burning sUSD in order to meet target ratio

swap.heading: Buy or Swap for sUSD in-order to burn to a healthy Collateralization Ratio
swap.text: In order to avoid liquidation and the penalty I want to buy sUSD.

self-liquidate.heading: Self Liquidate ({{selfLiquidationPenalty}} Penalty)
self-liquidate.text: Use the new Self Liquidation feature to clear your debt and unflag your account. Going down this route will incur a penalty of {{selfLiquidationPenalty}}

swap-links.heading: Buy sUSD
swap-links.text: Buy more sUSD on any of this DAPPS.
swap-links.once-purchased-text: Once purchased go to the <0>Burn Page</0> to burn and remove the flag.

delegate.missing-permission: You don't have the authorisation to perform this action

meta.description: A dApp for 1SY holders to earn rewards through staking.

og.title: SY Staking
og.description: A dApp for 1SY holders to earn rewards through staking.

approve.description: You must approve your {{stakedAsset}} tokens before proceeding. <0>Learn more.<0>

settle.description: You need to settle before being able to stake your {{stakedAsset}}.

confirm-transaction.title: Confirm Transaction
confirm-transaction.helper: Follow the Metamask prompts to authorize the transaction

info.title: Vest your 1SY staking rewards in escrow
info.title-migrate-l1: Migrate to new L1 escrow contract
info.subtitle: If you have staked your 1SY and minted sUSD, you are eligible to receive 1SY staking rewards, which will be escrowed here which you can vest in 12 months from the claim date.
info.subtitle-migrate-l1: As per <0>SIP-60</0>,  a new 1SY Escrow Contact has been released with new features (including L2 migration). All 1SY holders are required to migrate their escrowed 1SY before they can vest any escrowed 1SY.

info.title: Vest your escrowed 1SY from the token sale.
info.subtitle: If you have escrowed 1SY from the token sale, you can vest it here.

in-progress.title: Vesting in progress
in-progress.subtext: Waiting for the blockchain to confirm your transaction

new.title: Borrow Synths
new.low-cratio-tip: You can only borrow at {{safeMinCRatio}} or higher. Your position will be eligible for liquidation if it falls below {{minCRatio}}.
new.healthy-cratio-tip: Ensure your position stays above {{minCRatio}} to prevent liquidation.

info.title: Borrow Synths using other assets
info.subtitle: Borrow synthetic assets against ETH collateral.

pending-withdrawals.title: Pending Withdrawals
pending-withdrawals.title-tip: You will need to claim your ether collateral separately after your loan is closed, withdrawn or liquidated.

modify-loan.loan-interaction-delay: Please wait <0>{{waitETA}}</0> before reinteracting with the loan

button-labels.repaying-fully-error: CONSIDER CLOSING THE LOAN INSTEAD OF FULL REPAYMENT

migrate.title: Migrate Escrowed 1SY
migrate.subtitle: Migrate Escrowed schedule from L1 to L2

in-progress.title: Migration in progress
in-progress.subtext: Waiting for the blockchain to confirm your transaction

action.vest-needed: You need to vest before being able to migrate your escrowed 1SY

migrate.title: Migrate Debt Balance
migrate.subtitle: Migrate all active debt from L1 to L2

in-progress.title: Migration in progress
in-progress.subtext: Waiting for the blockchain to confirm your transaction

action.vest-needed: You need to vest before being able to migrate your debt balance

table.no-results: No transactions found, please try again.

bridge.headline: Bridge between L1 and L2
bridge.description: Bridge assets between layers and networks
bridge.native-bridge-desc: Bridge SUSD tokens natively between networks. This bridge guarantees a transfer at the exact amount, providing a reliable and straightforward way to manage your SUSD holdings across different networks. Note transferring SUSD from OP to mainnet involves a waiting period of 7 days.
bridge.instant-bridge-desc: Bridge with instant transactions at the current market price. Utilizing a socket plugin, it ensures you get the best value for your assets, making cross-network transfer efficient and cost-effective.
bridge.bridge-warning: Check the box and understand the bridging requirements to proceed
bridge.confirm-delay: I understand that bridging from Optimism to Ethereum Mainnet takes a 7 days delay. Read this <0>blog post for more details</0>

txn-modal.wait-to-prove: Wait up to a few minutes

bridge.relayer-warning: Looking to withdraw 1SY related tokens or having trouble finding your withdrawal? Use the <0>message relayer</0>
bridge.gas-warning: To avoid a failed transaction, it is suggested to include a higher gas limit than necessary. Transactions will not execute at this cost. Typical transaction's cost {{num}} ETH.

voting-power.title: Your voting power (L1 + L2)
voting-power.tooltip: Your voting power was calculated based on block {{blocknumber}}

delegated-voting-power.title: Your delegated voting power
delegated-voting-power.tooltip: You can delegate to another wallet at https://snapshot.org/#/delegate

total-voting-power.title: Total voting power
total-voting-power.tooltip: Total voting power was calculated based on block {{blocknumber}}

layer-2.gas-fee-info: Gas on L2 fluctuates based on congestion on L1 and L2

transaction.transaction-sent: Your transaction has been sent to the network

total-staking.staking-percentage-tooltip: Total percent of 1SY staked across both networks

system-status.subtitle: We apologise for any inconvenience caused, it will be back shortly.

info.title: Delegate powers to another wallet address
info.subtitle: Delegation enables a wallet to execute functions on behalf of another wallet: mint, burn, earn, and exchange, but not transfer. Manage addresses and their powers below.

list.title: Manage addresses
list.refresh-tooltip: This table is fetched from a subgraph, sometimes it takes a few seconds to sync after an action. Click the icon to refresh.

1.title: BURN DEBT & NOMINATE ACCOUNT
1.description: In order to merge accounts, first you need Burn any outstanding debt from the address you want to merge from in order to transfer the vested 1SY.

2.title: MERGE FROM DESTINATION ACCOUNT
2.description: Only when you have completed step 1 and logged into the destination account should you proceed with this step.

info.title: Burn sUSD Debt
info.description: Connect to the dApp with the wallet you wish to merge from, first make sure that you have burned all your sUSD debt. <0>Learn more.</0>

info.title: Merge Escrowed 1SY To Nominated Account
info.subtitle: Merge your vested 1SY balance by inputing the new destination address in the 'DESTINATION ADDRESS' field, this address is where you want your balances to be sent to. <0>Learn more.</0>

info.title: Merge Your Source Account To This One
info.description: Finally, please input the source address of where your balances have been sent from. <0>Learn more.</0>

tx.notice: Waiting for the blockchain to confirm your transaction.
